title: Alabama Typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132413im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-09-04%20at%203_5233.03.23%20PM.png)

Hello!

I recall a recent email release about a typeface similar to this, however, I cannot find it or the name. It's driving me nuts and I was hoping someone on here would know this is. Clearly the A is a stylistic alternative/swash/etc.

Thanks in advance!

Font: 

 Boston Truckstyle
